root.name: Steam Bandits: Outpost
root.description: OverviewPart of an ambitious 3-game project that was initially code named Project Roberts and within that project the first game, a casual city building game now known as Steam Bandits: Outpost, was code named Casual Roberts and had an estimated release of winter 2012. The 2nd and 3rd games in the series still don't have names but they are, in order of release, Steamy Roberts, a co-op open-world RPG planned for winter 2013 and Action Roberts, an airship dog-fighting flight sim planned for winter 2014.Gameplay....KickstarterOn July 19th, 2012, developer Iocaine Studios started a Kickstarter to help fund the first in a series of 3 planned and interconnected games in their Steam Bandits universe, Steam Bandits: Outpost. They reached their goal on August 19th, 2012 and you can view the Kickstarter page here.Useful LinksThe Official Steam Bandits: Outpost Webpage
